title: i can't seem to move up due to people afk'ing feeding.
body: I  went from B3 series down to no LP and on the brink of being demoted. I can't move up because of these afk'ers or feeders. My last game there was a player that chose riven to go against a nasus. That player rage quit and left the nasus fed. I can't move up because of afk's, feeders, or bad players. But usually due to afk's. I lost my series because i got 2 afk's in a row.

replies.body:
Since you are the only constant in the game (assuming you solo queue) you have a higher chance of not having an afk or feeder on your team assuming you do not feed or afk.

You just don't notice it as much because you are not upset with the person doing it. People remember negative experiences more than positive ones.

pretty much. Riot can see my reports. 
 there a few games in there where the player didn't know how to play. pretty much fed early game and gained kills later on, but since the player fed like 3 kills in a span of 8 min it was too late to catch up.

last 5 recent games I played as:
twitch (normal) : lost because janna  afked before we got to the ten min. mark
Sona: Lost because the riven fed nasus and afk'ed.
ramm:Lost because that gnar (top lane )fed darius because he was a dumbass that kept diving in.
Twitch: I won that normal game but not sure how. i played like shiit and was lagging everywhere.
and then i played as sona  : I lost because of our ADC (MF) afk'ed for like 10 min. She came back but it was too late.
It's not carrying if there isn't an afk.
